agentAbility.name: Shock and Awe
agentAbility.description: Chopper calls in a favor from his friend in the Air Force: a B-52 bomber flies over and drops its payload on the indicated point.

primaryAttack.name: Single Shot
primaryAttack.description: Requires reload after each shot, most accurate when stationary.

tankAbilities.name: Deploy Mines
tankAbilities.description: Deploys a minefield at the target location. Opponents driving over it trigger Blast Damage across the field adn take damage to their tracks.

tankAbilities.name: Demolition Charges
tankAbilities.description: Launches two large bombs at the target location. Upon impact, they create massive blasts.
